attribs.name: npc_resistances
attribs.current: bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

attribs.name: damage_resistances
attribs.current: bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-LZFLSfgNoiE5toZsdKf_desc
attribs.current: Magical darkness doesn't impede the abishai's darkvision.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-LZFLSfiqJmVqA7kVnmP_desc
attribs.current: The abishai has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-LZFLSfkjYOAVhJaHF2M_desc
attribs.current: The abishai's weapon attacks are magical.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-LZFLSfmPieZE0W-Tcrm_desc
attribs.current: At the start of its turn, the abishai can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls during that turn, but attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of its next turn.

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-LZFLSfpk1ZSKR-Yzu9P_description
attribs.current: The abishai makes two attacks: one with its longsword and one with its claw.

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-LZFLSfwFNAQwG8lxy7i_description
attribs.current: Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage, or 8 (1d10 + 3) slashing damage if used with two hands.

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-LZFLSgIxix9alSoUtdf_description
attribs.current: Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) cold damage.

attribs.name: repeating_npcreaction_-LZFLSgV8RpyCzrs8cY8_desc
attribs.current: In response to taking damage, the abishai makes a bite attack against a random creature within 5 feet of it. If no creature is within reach, the abishai moves up to half its speed toward an enemy it can see, without provoking opportunity attacks.

attribs.name: repeating_npcreaction_-LZFLSgV8RpyCzrs8cY8_description
attribs.current: In response to taking damage, the abishai makes a bite attack against a random creature within 5 feet of it. If no creature is within reach, the abishai moves up to half its speed toward an enemy it can see, without provoking opportunity attacks.
